widgets.name: Sales Overview
widgets.text: Displays sales data for the current month.

widgets.name: Revenue Chart
widgets.text: Shows a bar chart of revenue over the past year.

widgets.name: Campaign Performance
widgets.text: Tracks the performance of marketing campaigns.

widgets.name: Lead Generation
widgets.text: Displays the number of leads generated this month.

widgets.name: Support Tickets
widgets.text: Shows the number of support tickets opened and closed.
